name: My first game! (Parity64)
description: This is just a small game I made in RPG maker XP to learn how to use the engine. I plan on making better full games in the future. This game's setting is based on my concept art for a specific area in a game I want to make, a Yume Nikki inspired game. There isnt really much to do here, as theres only 3 rooms, but I hope that this will lead to me being able to make an actually good game in the future. Consider this the demo for my upcoming project.
